"""
 Tries to find a Web Page related to the current Product
 with publication section set to "website/product/short_description"
 
 This short description made of HTML can be used to provide
 a better description than the one provided by default on
 the product.
 
 TODO:
 - use cache for description
 - remove hardcoding by using site properties
 - make sure we can include javascript in HTML
 of web pages (a generic requirement which will lead
 to changes in ERP5 TextDocument class)
 - Rename to Resource_... since this script also
 applied to services
 - Handle language and version selection, possibily predicate
 just like WebSection
 - rename to use asHTML terminology
 """
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 category_path = 'portal_categories/publication_section/website/product/short_description'
 
 # Find a related web page with appropriate publication_section
 web_page = portal.portal_catalog(portal_type='Web Page',
 default_follow_up_uid=context.getUid(),
 default_publication_section_uid=context.restrictedTraverse(category_path).getUid(), # XXX Bad hardcoding
 )
 if web_page is None or len(web_page) == 0:
 return context.Base_translateString("No more information for this product.")
 return web_page[0].getObject().asStrippedHTML()
